title: Link: Taubes Contra Guyenet on Sugar
summary:
Key ideas
- Gary Taubes presents his case against sugar
- The case against sugar has faced criticism
- Taubes responds to the criticisms through a new post

Key learnings
- There is ongoing debate about the effects of sugar
- Different experts have different opinions on the topic
- Criticisms and counterarguments are important for advancing the conversation

Key questions
- What are the main arguments for and against the consumption of sugar?
- How can we determine the impact of sugar on health?
- What is the role of policies in regulating sugar consumption?
